name: Sid Meier's Railroads! Saved Game
summary: Learn about .SMRAILROADSSAVEDGAME files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Unless you choose a different location, saved games are automatically saved in the following directory: [install directory]\​Sid_Meiers_Railroads\​Saves. If you double-click the file it will launch the application and load the saved game.

description: Saved game file created and used by Sid Meier's Railroads!, a real-time strategy train engine game; stores game progress data, which includes train, depots, tracks, cities, game difficulty, and game scenario.
